Generated by DocFX

Class PermissionsCollection<T>

Represents a collection of permissions with indexed access, supporting synchronization for concurrent operations.

Syntax
public class PermissionsCollection<T> : IndexedCollection<T>, IList<T>, ICollection<T>, IEnumerable<T>, IEnumerable where T : class, IIndexed
Type Parameters
Name Description
T

The type of permissions in the collection, constrained to types that implement IIndexed.
